data.Name: Environment-related innovations
data.Definition: Percentage share of environment-related inventions of all domestic technologies. Inventions to ensure the protection and recovery of the environment. These are inventions for various environment-related technologies, including environmental management, water-related adaptation and climate change mitigation technologies.The indicator measures the number of new products and technologies developed domestically based on patent data extracted from worldwide patent statistical database (PATSTAT).

data.Name: Environment-related innovations
data.Definition: Percentage share of environment-related inventions of all world technologies. Inventions to ensure the protection and recovery of the environment. These are inventions for various environment-related technologies, including environmental management, water-related adaptation and climate change mitigation technologies.The indicator measures the number of new products and technologies developed domestically based on patent data extracted from worldwide patent statistical database (PATSTAT).

data.Name: Environment-related innovations:
data.Definition: Number of environment-related inventions per person in Uzbekistan. Inventions to ensure the protection and recovery of the environment. These are inventions for various environment-related technologies, including environmental management, water-related adaptation and climate change mitigation technologies.The indicator measures the number of new products and technologies developed domestically based on patent data extracted from worldwide patent statistical database (PATSTAT).

data.Name: Public expenditures in environmental protection
data.Definition: Share of public budget for environmental protection. E.g.,Â environmental research and development in renewable energy sources.
data.Source: Ministry for Ecology, Environmental Protection and Climate Change MEEPCCh

data.Name: Public expenditures in environmental protection
data.Definition: Percentage of total GDP, government expenditure on green growth (GG). This measures how much the government invests in green initiatives

data.Name: Public expenditures in environmental protection
data.Definition: Share of public budget for SDG-13.

data.Name: Environment-related tax revenues
data.Definition: Share of income collected by the government through environment-related taxes of all revenues.
data.Source: Ministry for Ecology, Environmental Protection and Climate Change MEEPCCh

data.Name: Environment-related subsidies
data.Definition: government support to assist the energy sector to keep prices low.  The indicator measures benefits and privileges provided to the oil energy sectors.

data.Name: Environment-related subsidies
data.Definition: government support to assist the electric energy sector to keep prices low.  The indicator measures benefits and privileges provided to the energy sectors.

data.Name: Environment-related subsidies
data.Definition: government support to assist the natural gas energy sector to keep prices low.  The indicator measures benefits and privileges provided to the oil energy sectors.

data.Name: Price of fuel
data.Definition: Real price per litre for diesel and petrol (in USD 2015) using purchasing power parity (PPP)

data.Name: Price of fuel
data.Definition: Real price per litre for diesel and petrol (in USD 2015) using purchasing power parity (PPP)

data.Name: Price of fuel
data.Definition: Average nominal retail price of petrol per litter (authors calculation

data.Name: Price per kWh of electricity
data.Definition: measures changes in the end-user price for electricity (residential and industry use), using 2015 price as base year. The dynamics in the energy tariffs over time show policy reforms for valuing energy sources

data.Name: Price per kWh of electricity
data.Definition: measures changes in the end-user price for electricity (residential and industry use), using 2015 price as base year. The dynamics in the energy tariffs over time show policy reforms for valuing energy sources
